vs-avatar/text.description: If the text is very long, only the first letter is added.

vs-avatar/textColor.description: Define the color of the Text.

vs-avatar/src.description: the address of the image for an image avatar

vs-avatar/color.description: Define the color of the Avatar (does not affect the image).

vs-avatar/badge.description: Define if the badge is active and what is its value in number

vs-avatar/badgeColor.description: Define the color of the Badge.

vs-avatar/icon.description: Define the icon within the Avatar.

vs-avatar/iconPack.description: Icon Pack to be used. If not set, icon will default to Material Icons. ex. FA4 uses fa or fas, FA5 uses fas, far, or fal.
